name: Duality (itch) (cxsquared)
description:
Ludum Dare Page

Duality is a rhythm game with a bullet hell twist. I'm pretty happy with how it turned out. There's no lose condition so the only goal is to see how high of a score you can get. I really tried to add a bit of polish to is and I think I did a decent job. I mainly use the two button controls theme but tried to incorporate growth into a difficulty mechanic. My highest score is a 926. I'm interested to see how well others can do.

I recommend that you use a mouse.

Feedback is always welcome.

Made using Haxe and HaxeFlixel.
Art done in Photoshop/Illustrator.
Music/Sfx done in Ableton Live.

#LDJAM #LD34
